title: Untouchable
description: Ethan Elliot never wanted to be a superhero. But when his powers flare up to save his life—and the lives of innocents—he has no choice in the matter. Plunged into a world of capes, costumes and derring-do, he’ll do whatever it takes to survive. Even if that means casting away his old life to become someone else. Maybe even someone better…
author: S.A. Starcevic
